content: motley motif convertible backpack crossbody bag by chloe crochet 222 1 final bag size with granny square side length of 4 75 - 14 inches tall - 10 inches wide at base this pattern uses the radiant sun granny square free pattern available but it can easily be exchanged for whatever granny square you want the final size of the bag will be approximately height = 3 x square side length width at base = 2 x square side length worsted yarn / size 4 total yardage 496 yds 12 squares 295 yds 4 triangles 47 yds strap 85 yds strap tube 13 yds joining of squares & triangles + upper rim 56 yds 2 12 squares you will need 12 squares for this bag you can use any square block you want i recommend you choose a square in the size range of 4-5 5 inches a larger square will produce a larger bag you will have to modify the triangles to match the side length of whatever square you choose pattern this pattern uses the radiant sun granny square you can substitute any afghan block though the radiant sun granny square has a side length of 4 75 inches 3 with worsted/medium/size 4 yarn and a 5 0mm hook makes a square that is 4 75 in wide notes no turning us terminology in the same stitch * *
